component.name: CustomLabelList
component.script:
sub init()
' observers m.top.observeField("itemFocused", "onItemFocusedChanged") end sub
sub onItemFocusedChanged(pMessage as Object) index = pMessage.getData()
if index = 1 then m.top.findNode("label").opacity = 0.35 else m.top.findNode("label").opacity = 1.0 end if
end sub
